description: Camellia reticulata 'Dataohung' CRIMSON ROBE is an amazing plant species for many reasons. This flowering evergreen shrub is native to China, and produces beautiful, rich deep crimson-red flowers in late winter or early spring. Due to its long bloom period, Camellia reticulata 'Dataohung' CRIMSON ROBE will keep your garden in bloom all year round. It is a vigorous grower and loves the sun, so even though it thrives in semi shaded areas, it will produce even more flowers in the full sun. This species is also suitable for bonsai, making it a versatile garden addition. With its stunning blooms and vibrant green foliage, Camellia reticulata 'Dataohung' CRIMSON ROBE is an eye-catching and reliable shrub for any garden.
